QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_CurtainWallQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition:
Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of curtain walls.
## Comments
### Height
Total height of the curtain wall. It should only be provided, if it is constant along the curtain wall path.
### Length
Along center line (even if different to the wall path).
### Width
Only be provided, if it is constant along the curtain wall path.

QtoDef.Name: Width
QtoDef.Definition: The width of the object. Only given, if the object has constant thickness (prismatic).

QtoDef.Name: GrossSideArea
QtoDef.Definition: Area of the wall as viewed by an elevation view of the middle plane of the wall. It does not take into account any wall modifications (such as openings).

QtoDef.Name: NetSideArea
QtoDef.Definition: Area of the object as viewed by an elevation view of the middle plane of the object. It does take into account all object modifications (such as openings).
